alert.note: Alert for Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 4:42PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Weld and east central Larimer Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 441 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles east of Eaton to Fort Collins, or along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Greeley to 55 miles north of Denver. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Collins, Windsor, Wellington, Eaton, Severance, Ault, Pierce, Timnath, Nunn, Purcell, Carr, Galeton, Rockport and Lucerne. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County
